name: Notion Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Notion Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Notion API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Notion API | (必填项)

notionNotice.displayName: In Notion, make sure to add your connection to the pages you want to access.
notionNotice.name: notionNotice
notionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: In Notion, make sure to add your connection to the pages you want to access.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: page

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many users

blockId.name: blockId
blockId.description: The Notion Block to get all children from, when using 'By URL' mode make sure to use the URL of the block itself, you can find it in block parameters in Notion under 'Copy link to block'
blockId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Block | 作用: The Notion Block to get all children from, when using 'By URL' mode make sure to use the URL of the block itself, you can find it in block parameters in Notion under 'Copy link to block' | 默认值: {'mode': 'url', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

blockUi.name: blockUi
blockUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Blocks | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

fetchNestedBlocks.name: fetchNestedBlocks
fetchNestedBlocks.natural_language_description: 参数名: Also Fetch Nested Blocks | 默认值: False

simplifyOutput.name: simplifyOutput
simplifyOutput.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify Output | 默认值: True

databaseId.name: databaseId
databaseId.description: The Notion Database to operate on
databaseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Database | 作用: The Notion Database to operate on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Search Text | 作用: The text to search for

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

title.name: title
title.description: Page title. Appears at the top of the page and can be found via Quick Find.
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: Page title. Appears at the top of the page and can be found via Quick Find. | (必填项)

propertiesUi.name: propertiesUi
propertiesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Properties | 默认值: {}

pageId.name: pageId
pageId.description: The Page URL from Notion's 'copy link' functionality (or just the ID contained within the URL)
pageId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Page Link or ID | 作用: The Page URL from Notion's 'copy link' functionality (or just the ID contained within the URL) | (必填项)

filterType.name: filterType
filterType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 默认值: none

matchType.name: matchType
matchType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Must Match | 默认值: anyFilter

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

jsonNotice.displayName: See Notion guide to creating filters
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice
jsonNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: See Notion guide to creating filters

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | (必填项)
